Name: Space Demon Combat Tactics III
About the game: Space Demons Join the High Commander as the eternally loyal Green in an epic journey to save the Blues from the menace of the Greys and their evil Red Gems ! Combat 15 missions of nerve-racking, spine-shredding, brain-blasting, planet-shattering, ground-breaking combat ! Engaging, thought-provoking, mind-bending, conscience-warping plot ! Enjoy 30 minutes of Space-Invader-Style shoot-'em-up entertainment.
